A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
To all the fan boys....screaming Disney are destroying my star wars. Until a few days ago I would have considered myself a fanboy. Now I feel I am something apart. I am a fan. I loved the movie. It is not the same old star wars no. It is a new story. One worthy of our appreciation it is not a re-tread of what has gone before....if that is all you want then rewatch the original trilogy.....or the prequels if you enjoy them. Love what you love.

The movie is a bold tour de force in story telling and visually stunning. And a welcome addition to the star wars franchise. Go see this movie and judge for yourself with open eyes.forgetting all that has gone before.

Well done to all involved.
